welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Sittard, a charming city in the heart of the Netherlands known for its rich history and vibrant culture. We invite you to explore and experience all that Sittard has to offer, and we hope you enjoy your stay!"

terminals.name: Terminal A
terminals.description: The main terminal at Maastricht/aachen Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal B
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Maastricht/aachen Airport, primarily used for low-cost carriers.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
